website_summaries.verdict: Choose this scratch map for travel or educational purposes for discovering all of the states in the U.S.
pros: A midsize map that measures 17 x 24 inches
Scratch off areas to reveal a brightly colored map of the U.S. Includes an impressive accessory kit with scratch tool, magnifying glass, eraser, stickers, and bag
cons: A few areas seem harder than others to scratch off

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be similar to scratching off lotto tickets, but it's impossible to completely clear any part of the map. The guitar pick that came with it didn't work, so I tried a coin, a toothpick, a gift card, and the back of a knife. The knife is the only thing that actually took the stuff off, but it tore the map underneath. And everything I tried left indents in the map, so even if I could actually clear a state I wouldn't want to display the map because it'd be covered in indentations! This was a serious waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking map!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice looking map that looks good enough to hand on the wall! It took a little time to scratch off all of the states my wife and I have stayed in over the years. I was sort of looking for a way to identify states we've stayed at least one night in as opposed to states just driven through. I ended up scratching off lines of the "drive through" states and they look very good! Now when we actually stay in them I'll scratch off the rest of the lines. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Darney

customer_reviews.title: Will take time to get it “un-curled” from packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for my son to open on Christmas. Attempted to put it up on our family cork board but it is so heavily curled from the tube packaging we can’t get it to stay pinned ( literally 12 pins and still flies off the wall). Also tried heavy duty tape. Today is day 6 laying flat with heavy books on it to flatten it out. Will try again- bummer as there are a bunch of pin marks in it already and we haven’t scratched anything off yet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hempfling

customer_reviews.title: Keeping tabs
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy paper and easy to scratch off. Great way to keep track of your travels. Looks amazing framed.
customer_reviews.author: A. F. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present to mark off races run in each state. Every month or two, I removed it from the frame and scratched off the respective states. Had no issues for 16 months. Last week, had difficulties scratching off two more states; neither would scratch completely off and ended up ripping one trying more aggressively. Nothing has changed regarding the map, frame, or hanging location. I hope this doesn't continue to be an issue in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Nice finish once scratched off and cleaned with the eraser. Takes a good amount of effort to scratch off, eraser does a much better job. However, because it's a thicker scratch-off material, you won't get a lot of accidental scratches or damage to areas you don't want scratched off yet. Because it is rolled up for delivery, it's nearly impossible to get it flat even after laying heaving stuff on it for weeks, I'll likely frame it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Does not function as promised.
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to scratch off the places visited even with the enclosed pic. Not at all happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cool but will continue to roll up on you.
customer_reviews.text: Cool product but we cannot get it to stay straight even after weeks of putting it under heavy texts books.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: cant recommend this map. doesn't scratch off , maybe I got a bad one very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Ripped.
customer_reviews.text: My map arrived with a chunk ripped out of the bottom. I’m so sad. I was hoping to frame it and hang it up for my boys to see all the states we have visited on our road trips. I’ll be sending it back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jdt

customer_reviews.title: Too much work to scratch off
customer_reviews.text: The gold top that you scratch off was too much work. Some parts would not come off at all. Look at the Keys in Florida and the middle of Georgia. I almost got carpal tunnel after 5 mins of scratching. The states I did finish looks messy. The eraser only helped so much. I was hoping to have something nice to hang in my home office but this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Gator Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Concept is great but execution is poor. It’s a lot harder to scratch off than it should be and the map looks rough when you’ve scratched off a state or a flag.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Although I have yet to scratch off any states, I must say this is a pretty cool item! I got this as a gift for my boyfriend, but I'm waiting for Christmas so we can scratch off the states we've been to together. It comes with a little pack of small items (pick to scratch, stickers, etc.), and I can't wait to work on it!
customer_reviews.author: tinababe

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming due to scratch off material
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of the entire map and colors of each state after scratching off the gold. However, the gold is extremely difficult to scratch off. I have a world scratch map that has a VERY user friendly gold cover, so I know it’s possible. Using a coin is also more effective than the included tool. If the gold was more user friendly, it would definitely be 5 stars. So as long as you have about 30-45 minutes to scratch off a few states, should be fine buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice quality product. I purchased it as a gift for my father who just turned 87; we thought it would be fun to do together so that he could tell us stories about all the places he has been in the United States. This map is a great size for mounting on hardboard and holding in his lap to scratch off. Thanks for quick delivery and nice product.
customer_reviews.author: aca92

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I hated how it’s an unusual size and can’t purchase a frame to fit it in. I hate how it was rolled and so it’s difficult to scratch the states without the entire thing rolling in a ball. I also thought the scratching surface would be easier to scrape off. Horrible product and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason why this is a 4 star and not a 5.... it is a tad hard to scratch off lol... I used a penny and man I had to really scratch at it.... glad they gave you the eraser - you will need it! it helps to get off all of the small pieces that just wont scratch off for a clean(ish) look.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cieslinski

customer_reviews.title: Size is fair but would be better if bigger
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to use this product but a quick inspection I noticed some of the scratch off paint were rubbing off. the Bag itself also has a weird noticeable smell coming out of it probably from the eraser. The size itself is pretty good, was wanting a bigger size as the map is on the higher end of price range but overall it's good.
customer_reviews.author: chong

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the product looks good. Between the pick and eraser it scratched off easily enough without damaging the underlying image. My wife and I are in a friendly competition with my parents to see who can hit all 50 States first and these maps are going to be perfect for it. I ordered mine first to be sure it was a decent product. I am ordering the one for my parents as soon as I leave this review.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: looks like art, works like a fun project....
customer_reviews.text: My son and I want to visit all 50 states. I have this beautiful map framed and matted with no glass and hung in my staircase with plenty of space around it. As we visit a state, we pick our favorite family photo from the trip and frame and matte that pic next to the map with the state scratched off.... it's so fun!... and it looks really nice. I can't wait to fill up the whole wall and scratch off the next state... it feels like such an accomplishment
customer_reviews.author: Scarion Balish

customer_reviews.title: Also arrived VERY quickly and I had a good follow up email from the seller
customer_reviews.text: This item just arrived and was purchased for a birthday present, so will not be five. For another month, but it appears nicer than anticipated. Also arrived VERY quickly and I had a good follow up email from the seller. I anticipate this product to be as good or better than described or anticipated but will update review further if necessary after the birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Northwoods Hills

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: The tool that comes with it isn't very good at scratching off the gold coating. I'd suggest using a coin instead. Even with a coin, it still doesn't come off as clean as you'd hope.. but it works. Make sure you use the eraser after you've scratched.. that helps clear it up a little better. The eraser won't pull off the gold coating, so you're safe to use that pretty freely. Overall, you get what you pay for, it's a fairly good map.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift for travelers
customer_reviews.text: Very professional looking map with amazing details (highways, sports stadiums, national parks/monuments). Extremely impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: StilettoSam

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to scratch off the states. Paper is ripping underneath or bubbling up. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive but not for people with OCD
customer_reviews.text: The scratch off takes a long time and when you have travelled a lot, it sometimes pisses you off! Overall looks really nice once you get through with scratching off!
customer_reviews.author: Devanshu

customer_reviews.title: This had to be the worst product I have ordered
customer_reviews.text: This had to be the worst product I have ordered. You could not scratch off the outer gold in order to reveal the states you had been to. I even tried with a knife and it didn't work. I ended up throwing it away and ordering one on Etsy....that one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Danita L McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Does not scratch off well at all!
customer_reviews.text: The scratch off part does not work. Using the plastic scratch off tool that comes with the kit or using a coin, makes no difference. The gold scratch off material just smudges and the underlying map is unreadable. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: David Leatherman

customer_reviews.title: Wrong map
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Scratch Off USA Map Poster as a Christmas gift. When the recipient opened it (upon returning to their home), it was a world map. The sticker on the outside says USA Map Poster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this map as a present for my eight year old nephew. He is obsessed with geography, national parks, and has traveled to numerous states. I thought this would be a good gift that he can grow with as time passes. The map and its accessories do not disappoint! With plenty of tools and stickers, he is excited about each detail that is revealed and cannot wait to personalize the map. I would definitely buy this product again and recommend it to anyone who travels or wants to inspire the next generation to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to frame it
customer_reviews.text: Love this scratch of got map. Be careful when getting it out of the tube it comes it, it’s hard to get out and easy to mark. Scratching the states is a little bit difficult because of the lines but if you take your time you’ll get it. I used the edge of a credit card and that seemed to work the best.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Hard To Scratch
customer_reviews.text: It could be a little easier to scratch off. Other than that, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nate K

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited for the map along with the accessories
customer_reviews.text: Updated. Eventhough.. my first map did not come with the accessories. The seller was kind enough to immediately contact me and send me a replacement map. I will definitely say great customer service. The map itself is beautiful. I loved how different states have different colors. Fun way to keep a track of your travels!
customer_reviews.author: Bhumi

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, packaged and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of this map. Fun and interesting to look at and scratch. Great colors and presentation. extras with map for scratching and such are no frills but nice to have handy with map. Recommend if you’re looking for a scratch map.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than was expected. Hard to find a frame for this map. I wish it sells with a frame
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Travelers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a retirement gift for someone traveling the country by RV for a couple of years. She loved it, can't wait to get updates on her travels. The only negative would be the extra I paid for one-day shipping, since it was delivered with two-day (the same as I would get with my Prime membership); but the item itself looked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was the cool gift at Christmas this year!
customer_reviews.text: I was just searching Amazon to find my kids (who are older) something they didn't expect when I saw these advertised. They are so neat and I told them both to have it completely scratched off by age 50. Looking forward to their adventures.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Great US map.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, detail, and quality. I am very pleased. The flags at the bottom are neat as well. Im looking forward to finding a nice frame. I plan to use it to mark off my goal of running a half marathon in each state.
customer_reviews.author: Christyn

customer_reviews.title: Great size and gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, Canrt wait to start scratching off everywhere we go together , got as a wedding gift for my brother too
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Jean

customer_reviews.title: The scratch off doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea but the scratch off is junk. I got it for my 13 year old for Christmas. It’s too hard to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made scratch off map. The ability for detail is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. One is a gift and one for my daughter. I opened the gift one to put it in a frame and the corner was ripped off. Its not a big section bit not small either. And it was too late to switch because my daughter had already scratched hers off. Kinda disappointed. I'll just have to explain to the birthday person that it came like that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift and my boyfriend loved it. He's a traveler and this is a great and fun way for him to mark off the places he's been. Love the little extras included too
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this map!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! The tool to scratch off is like a guitar pick and works perfectly. I tacked it into the wall and it is a great addition to the room! I like that the background is black and each state scratches off to be a different color. So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as elegant as i thought alo hard to get off when scratched
customer_reviews.author: terri nelson

customer_reviews.title: This map does a great job of that
customer_reviews.text: We travel every summer. My 16 year old daughter wanted a way to keep up with where she has been. This map does a great job of that, Easy to use and looks good. She has it in a frame on her wall.
customer_reviews.author: John Reece

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to exploring!
customer_reviews.text: The map and accessories look to be high quality and my two sons are excited to start scratching off the places we've been.
customer_reviews.author: John Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Fun Interactive Map
customer_reviews.text: Super fun interactive map. Really makes me want to travel more so I can scratch off more states. It comes with a bunch of fun accessories and is great for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: H. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. I think it will be a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: kimlene59

customer_reviews.title: ... going on a roadtrip across country and they absolutely love it. They have two young children and are ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map for my family that is going on a roadtrip across country and they absolutely love it. They have two young children and are able to do this with them as it is so child-friendly and would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn-Lynn Kretschmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a Christmas gift came in the time frame they said and the box was not damaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Product
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. Perfect for travelers. Exceptional customer care as well
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Scratched through the paper
customer_reviews.text: I scratched through the paper pretty quickly trying to get the gold flack off. I was using the giving scratcher and wasn't pressing very hard. Overall pretty poor quality. Update: The owner reached out to me and sent another one for free. It was 100% better and I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Defective Christmas gift, don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: The entire image underneath the scratch-off matieral is off-center. Everything is in the incorrect spot. Plus, the scratch-off material doesn't come off properly, even when using the eraser to remove smudges. Requesting a refund and sending it back. Super disappointed as this was a Christmas gift and now I have to go through extra hassle to fix someone else's mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The map and all the accessories are great quality. Will end up costing me a fortune ...
customer_reviews.text: The map and all the accessories are great quality. Will end up costing me a fortune in flights so I can scratch off the rest of the states.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Allen

customer_reviews.title: I am a machinst and have severe OCD about alignment of features like that. I was pleasantly surprised at the print ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the underlying graphics and the scratch-off overlay would not align very well. I am a machinst and have severe OCD about alignment of features like that. I was pleasantly surprised at the print quality of both layers. Well done!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My uncle loved it, it was a gift for his birthday
customer_reviews.author: Vivianathaly

customer_reviews.title: This map looks great and seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: This map looks great and seems to be good quality. I was really concerned that I would scratch the actual map but it hasn't happened yet and I have scratched off 13 states. I have found that quarters work better than the scratcher that comes with the map but all the other accessories are great.
customer_reviews.author: H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A little be of more information about every state like a little book with all the places te you can visit.
customer_reviews.text: Bring a lots of items to make it more excited to record all your visit. Its to small.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful way to track your travels
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to remember where you’ve been and where you need to go. I like the size as it’s not a huge poster but large enough to see details and to take with me on my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki G Ward

customer_reviews.title: Mom is having fun scratching off states she visited and planning her next ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Mom is having fun scratching off states she visited and planning her next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: This map is excellent, exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This map is excellent, exactly as pictured. Very nice product and easy transaction. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fun map!
customer_reviews.text: Fun way for my sons to keep up with their travels- nice conversation/competition(!) piece with friends. 4.75 stars bc some spots on the map are more difficult to scratch off than others.

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old son has delighted in scratching off the states he has visited
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product with exceptional, personalized customer service. My 3 year old son has delighted in scratching off the states he has visited, and the map promises years of excitement and fun as he/we anticipate visiting more states.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: Received a replacement extremely fast and it was exactly what I was looking for! Thanks to the owner for making this right and handling the situation nicely! The map is perfect and my husband is super excited!

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for my wife and she is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she is very happy with it. The different colors for each state are great.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking map
customer_reviews.text: Great looking map. Nice to remember where you have visited and start some conversations.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion for travellers
customer_reviews.text: Simply awesome. The details on the map specially the state flags and landmarks are a particularly better touch. The inclusion of the tools makes it the perfect tool to have for someone who likes to travel.

customer_reviews.title: Great Display
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to travel so he thought this map was the coolest thing. He enjoyed scratching off the places he has visited and placed the map in a poster sized frame for the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: States easily scratch off without damage to the map
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband, to track our travels on the motorcycle. States easily scratch off without damage to the map. I mounted it on a bulletin board, leaving room around the map for pictures and souvenirs.

customer_reviews.title: great map
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my grandkids they loved it and have marked off the states they have visited It also is very appealing to look at

customer_reviews.text: This map is perfect to document which states I’ve traveled to so far. I like the dark color and keep it framed on display. I had an issue with my first one and the seller sent me a replacement very quickly! Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect size and the tools it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size and the tools it comes with are really creative. We've traveled around the U.S. and this is a perfect way to mark where we have been. It's so cool to see all the places you've visited.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great map. My daughter loves to use it to remember our trips.

customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a couple that were getting ready to retire and planned to travel. They are enjoying using this to plan their travels.

customer_reviews.title: The paper is sturdy, should frame well after we get it flattened
customer_reviews.text: The paper is sturdy, should frame well after we get it flattened. Looks quite nice.Have not tried the scratching tool yet, but it comes in a handy cloth pouch.

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift for the any traveler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughter's birthday and she loved it! We love traveling already and this gives her a visual tracker of where she has been and where she would like to go next.

customer_reviews.title: Really great scratchable US map
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. since I got in the US I'm using it and all my friends want it. Great quality and great details.

customer_reviews.title: Great Map!
customer_reviews.text: love it, just what I had been wanting a way to track my travels;

customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this map! I framed it and it works so nicely to track our travels!

customer_reviews.text: The map was quite nice. Since I am from Michigan there is a correction you should make. Interstate highway I-69 is marked as I-94.

customer_reviews.title: USA and World maps
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these two as gifts. Both people really enjoyed them. The detail is amazing and will be fun to document future trips, also.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly kankowski

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea to keep track of your travels and adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Customer 1

product_meta.title: Scratch Off Map of The United States – Deluxe Travel Map with 50 State Flags and Landmarks - Tracks Where You Have been, Full Accessories Set Included, Perfect Gift for Travelers, by Earthabitats
feature_bullets: ✈ SCRATCH OFF USA MAP. Track your travels, scratch off where you have been in the USA to reveal the beautifully colored states! Our map features rich cartographic details of the terrain, capitals, major cities and state flags. Printed on thick 220GSM paper and protected with laminated finishing, our map arrives without scratches and ensures quality.

✈ PERFECT GIFT FOR TRAVELERS. Our map comes in gift ready packaging to delight the travel enthusiasts in your life. A perfect conversation starter, give them a special moment scratching the map with loved ones while sharing stories and dreaming new adventures together!
✈ US STATES OUTLINED. AMERICA THE BEAUTIFUL. Discover the treasures of the country, from sea to shining sea! National parks, major landmarks, highways and Route 66. Have you seen them all?

✈ US SCRATCH OFF MAP. We bundled in companion accessories to complete your scratching experience. A comfortable scratching tool, memory stickers to mark your travel memories, eraser to clean scratch smudges and magnifying strip for the visually challenged. Frame the map with our Magnetic Hanger Frame and impress your guest with this striking piece!

✈ LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. If you haven’t had a 5-star experience with us or your product, we will do whatever we can to fix that. All our products are tested and loved by us, we love our customers and your 100% satisfaction is our top priority.
